attributes.action: Urge the Ministry of Defence to immediately investigate replacing Britain’s ageing fleet of RAF Nimrod aeroplanes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain’s fleet of Nimrod aeroplanes are 40 years old. Although the equipment of board my be state of the art, the actual plane was based on the original Commit aircraft: The firs ever commercial jet liner.
